verbs.description: [ARG0: Russian President Vladimir Putin] [V: lamented] [ARG1: what he described as a stalled effort to improve relations between the US and Russia under President Donald Trump] . Putin blames the political firestorm currently surrounding Trump , fueled in part by the probe of Russia 's meddling in the 2016 US election .
